description: This Dart file defines a NotificationService class responsible for handling local notifications in a Flutter application using the flutter_local_notifications plugin. It initializes the notification plugin, sets up timezone data, and provides a method to schedule reminder notifications at specified times.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class that manages scheduling local notifications for reminders within the app.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the notification plugin and timezone data; should be called during app startup.

methods.name: showReminder
methods.description: Schedules a local notification reminder at a specified DateTime with provided title and body.
